practiceAreas: Personal injury|Car Accidents|Medical Malpractice|Social Security Disability|Workers Compensation
description:
Whenever you sustain a personal injury in the Alexandria, Louisiana, area, come to the law firm of Hunter and Beck. We are two attorneys with a combined 60 years of experience aggressively protecting our clients' rights and getting them the compensation they deserve.

As a full-service personal injury law firm, we can help you in the following areas:

  • Auto and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Social Security Disability and SSI
  • Medical malpractice - medication errors, surgical mistakes, hospital negligence
  • Workers' compensation - state and city employees, corrections officers, medical personnel, union employees, office personnel, telecommunications/IT technicians, carpenters, iron workers, electricians, plumbers, masons, laborers

Our slogan says it all: When you hire Hunter and Beck, you get 100% of Hunter and Beck. What this means is that we never pass you off to an associate, paralegal or staff member the way some personal injury law firms do. Instead, beginning with your free initial consultation, you always work directly with one of our attorneys from beginning to end. It also means that you get 100% of our skill, experience and passion in pursuing your maximum compensation.

In addition to your complimentary initial consultation, our law firm also offers virtual appointments to keep you safe and ease your mind. Finally, we accept all major credit cards.
